panel.teaser: Doing polls easy, fast and near real-time. You can create and control a session, or join an existing session and cast votes. Where do you want to go next?

dialog.title: Create a new session
dialog.text: Give your session a name and maybe a nice description
dialog.name: Session name

disabled.title: Management panel is disabled
disabled.text: You are not the owner of this session. Management of this session is disabled. You can attend the session by clicking the link below.

polls.empty-state: There are no polls in this session. start by creating a first poll
